When performs the indexing of your resources, referenced content is not taken into account. For example, when DITA documents are indexed, the content referenced in a conref or conkeyref attribute is not parsed. The files that make up the index are stored on disk in the [user_home_directory]\AppData\Roaming\com.oxygenxml\lucene [user_home_directory]\AppData\Roaming\com.oxygenxml.author\lucene
[user_home_directory]\AppData\Roaming\com.oxygenxml.developer\lucene folder.
